description:
A serving of deep-dish fleece for core warmth on cold days. It features double-sided plush pile that is super soft and cozy, with a 3-panel hood for when a toque isn't enough.

  • Double sided Polartec® shearling is made from 100% recycled fibres
  • Lined 3-panel hood and tall collar provide cold-weather coverage
  • 1/2 zip makes it easy to vent extra heat and means you can leave your toque on when taking on and off
  • Elastic binding in hood, cuffs and hem seal in warmth
  • Kangaroo pocket keeps your hands out of the cold, and your phone close
  • Zippered chest pocket for securing small necessities
  • Regular fits feels just like you want to
name: Patagonia Retro Pile Pullover - Men's
